EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL with furnace_source holding 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS with fuel inventory containing 2 units of coal and furnace_result holding 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs; status: NO_POWER, research set to automation, electrical_id updated to 8296.
- ElectricityGroup (id=8296) connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; final status: NOT_CONNECTED with warnings: [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) producing steam; status: NO_FUEL with warning “out of fuel”; fluid_box holds approximately 200 units of water at 15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_system now set to [30380].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) extracting water; status: WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system now set to [30380].
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup at position(-6.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=30380 – status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=30381 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 21.5) with fluid_system=30382 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-3.5, 23.5) with fluid_system=30387 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=30386 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(3.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=30391 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(2.5, 24.5) with fluid_system=30390 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system=30393 – status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Fluid System Identifier Mismatch:
  - Repeated connection attempts used fluid_system identifiers (e.g. 30036, 30079, 30122, 30165, 30208, 30251, 30294, 30337) that do not match the active pipeline network. Verify and use the current active fluid_system value from a working PipeGroup before attempting a connection.

• Rigid Pipeline Stabilization:
  - Fixed waiting periods (10 seconds) for pipeline stabilization lead to unnecessary delays. Replace static delays with dynamic connectivity checks to ensure the pipeline is ready before proceeding.
